full_text: OFFICE OF THE STATE ATTORNEY FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT OF FLORIDA IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY BARRY E. KRISCHER STATE ATTORNEY July 24, 2008 , FL Re: State of Florida vs. JEFFREY E EPSTEIN Court Case No: 2006CF009454AMB- 2008CF009381AMB Agency: PALM BEACH POLICE DEPARTMENT Agency Case No: 05-0368 Dear Ms The case described above was closed on 06/26/2008 with the following result: PLED GUILTY TO CHARGES AND SENTENCED TO 12 MO IN COUNTY JAIL, FOLLOWED BY 6MO IN DOC AND 12MO. COMMUNITY CONTROL. DESIGNATED A SEX OFFENDER If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me. Sincerely, COPY LANNA BELOHLAVEK Assistant State Attorney cc: Evidence Custodian: evidence is no longer needed 07/26/17 401 N. Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida 33401-4209 (561) 355-7100 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00032706

text_blocks.content: FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT OF FLORIDA IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY

The case described above was closed on 06/26/2008 with the following result: PLED GUILTY TO CHARGES AND SENTENCED TO 12 MO IN COUNTY JAIL, FOLLOWED BY 6MO IN DOC AND 12MO. COMMUNITY CONTROL. DESIGNATED A SEX OFFENDER
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.
Sincerely, COPY LANNA BELOHLAVEK Assistant State Attorney

additional_notes: The document is a letter from the Office of the State Attorney to an individual regarding the case of State of Florida vs. JEFFREY E EPSTEIN. The letter is dated July 24, 2008, and is signed by LANNA BELOHLAVEK, Assistant State Attorney. The document has been redacted in some areas. The document also contains a stamp with the number DOJ-OGR-00032706.
